review.reviewBody: Bhaturas could be a little more thin, but the food is nice.
I always love the quality and quantity of the items cooked here. This is my one of favourite take out or delivery place for food. Keep up the tasty food folks!

quantity is good but quality is too poor
nan is with uncooked layer of maida
noodles were full of sweet sauce
had a bad dinner :-(
All dishes were delicious. Lamb Korma and Chicken Korma as great.
The item in the sweets section is just the gulab jamun? No ice cream or ras malai was received
